title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time
description: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, the 'Close All Saved' feature is not working as expected. After creating a new file 'f1.txt', selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu does not close any of the open editor windows.
OB:
Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time. Using build 20020508 with the latest UI code.
- Close all editors
- Create a new file 'f1.txt'
- Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu. Nothing happens.
EB: The 'Close All Saved' feature should close all open editor windows, including the newly created file 'f1.txt'.
SR:
1. Open the application using build 20020508 with the latest UI code.
2. Close all open editors.
3. Create a new file 'f1.txt'.
4. From the file menu, select 'Close All Saved'.

Expected result: All open editor windows, including 'f1.txt', should be successfully closed.
